(Simplified: 龃)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 且 indicates the sound; 齒 (teeth) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 齒 [ chǐ ] teeth; gears, cogs; age
    • 且 [ qiě ] moreover, also (post-subject); about to, will soon (pre-verb)
①(齟齬)牙齒上下對不上，喻意見不合，如“雙方發生齟齟”。
齟齬 [ jǔ yǔ ]: lit. unaligned teeth; fig. disagreement

齟字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齟； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1533第21
【集韻】在呂切，音咀。【說文】齒不相値曰齟齬。【六書故】鋸齒出入亦曰齟齬。　又【玉篇】齧也。【集韻】嚼也。　又【廣韻】牀呂切【集韻】狀所切，?音鉏。又【集韻】鋤加切，音查。義?同。　又【集韻】【韻會】?莊加切，音樝。【前漢·東方朔傳】令壺齟老柏塗。齟者，齒不正也。【張晏註】齟，讀如樝犁之樝。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Tooth Word Department] 　龃; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1533 21
[Ji Yun] In Lu Qi, Yinzui. [Said the text] The teeth are not in phase with each other, and it is said to be discordant. [Six Books] Zigzag in and out is also called discord.　[Jade articles] again. [Ji Yun] Chew too.　[Guang Yun] Bed Lü Che [Ji Yun] Zhuang Suo cut,? Sound 鉏. Also 【Jiyun】hoe add cut, sound check. Righteous? Same.　 [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Zhuang Jiaqie, sound haw. [Previous Han·Dongfang Shuo Biography] Linghu Lao Baitu. Those who are confused, the teeth are not right. [Zhang Yan's Note] 龃, read like the hawthorn of the haw plow.
